org.cougaar.util
Class ToStringMemo

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.util.ToStringMemo
Direct Known Subclasses:
ToStringMemo.SoftToStringMemo, ToStringMemo.UncachedToStringMemo
public abstract class ToStringMemo
extends java.lang.Object

A hack for computing a complex object's toString as needed, but without keeping it around for ever.

Nested Class Summary
static class ToStringMemo.SoftToStringMemo
          The standard ToStringMemo implementation
static class ToStringMemo.UncachedToStringMemo
          A version of ToStringMemo which doesn't really ever cache

static ToStringMemo getInstance(java.lang.Object gen)
          Construct a ToStringMemo which uses the parameter object's toString to build the memoized toString value.
abstract  java.lang.String toString()
